scripts.build:zip: rm -rf index.zip && npx tsc index.ts && zip -r -X "index.zip" ./ffmpeg ./index.js ./package.json
scripts.delpoy: rm -rf index.zip && npx tsc index.ts && zip -r -X "index.zip" ./index.js ./package.json && yc serverless function version create --function-name=videopreviewer --runtime nodejs14 --entrypoint index.handler --memory 128m --execution-timeout 3s --source-path ./index.zip
